question:
You have a Facebook friend living in another country and s/he is curious to learn about a major news item in your country.
Write a letter to your Facebook friend. In your letter
-	describe a news story in your country
-	explain why people are interested in it
-	say how the story personally relates to you
text: I hope this letter finds you fit and fine. I read your message on Facebook to seek my help with your presentation on my country and I am so glad that you are preparing a presentation on a major event in my nation.

As you asked me to tell you about an important event these days in my country, I want to enlighten you about the world’s biggest yoga camp that is being organized by the government on the 20th of this month. The news of this grand event is being broadcast by various international news channels such as BBC and Skynews. Moreover, the number of interested people is increasing day by day because they want to know more about yoga and its impact on health and fitness and also want to attend this biggest event in my country.

Further, being a yoga trainer, I am so excited to be a part of this event. In fact, I recently got a letter from the local administration to contribute to this event as a teacher which is really a great opportunity for me. In addition, I ensure you; I’ll send you all the updates, information and images on Facebook that will help you a lot not only to submit a wonderful presentation but also you may learn many things from this event.
Pay my regards to your parents.
